home.hero: Welcome to the AI assisted notes tool

hero.heading: AI assistants to improve your productivity
hero.description: Discover and try AI-powered assistants for your writing tasks. If none of them are suitable, create your own.

newsletter.heading: Subscribe to our newsletter.
newsletter.description: Keep up to date with our latest releases and more.
newsletter.weekly_articles_description: We post weekly articles with all the stack and implementation details for this tool.
newsletter.full_access_description: Get access to the alpha version and latest features released.

featured.heading: Everything you need to improve your productivity
featured.description: Find AI-powered assistants to help you with your writing tasks.

features.name: Create your own
features.description: You will be able to create and fine-tune your own assistant.

features.name: Secure
features.description: We store your conversations encrypted. Privacy at its best.

features.name: Open source

features.name: Pay-per-use
